abstract.text: Returns the image with the specified opacity value.
The color at the specified pixel location.
Returns a new thumbnail image at the specified size.
The number of times that an animated image should play through its frames before stopping.
Splits the images to tiles with the specified size.
Returns the main colors of the image.
Returns the image rotated to the specified degree.
The frames of an animated (e.g. GIF) image.
Creates a symbol image with the system symbol name.
Creates a symbol image with the system symbol name and symbol configuration.
Creates and returns an animated image.
Returns the image cropped to the specified rect.
The images of an animated (e.g. GIF) image.
The colors of an image.
Returns the image resized to fill the specified size.
A Boolean value that indicates whether the image is animated (e.g. a GIF).
A Boolean value that indicates whether the image is a symbol.
Returns a data object that contains the specified image in TIFF format.
Splits the images to tiles with the specified vertical and horizontal count.
Creates a symbol image with the system symbol name and symbol configuration.
Returns a new version of the current image, applying the specified configuration attributes on top of the current attributes.
Returns a data object that contains the image in JPEG format.
Returns the image resized to the specified size.
Constants that indicate which weight variant of a symbol image to use.
Creates a thumbnail image at the specified size asynchronously on a background thread.
Decodes an image synchronously and provides a new one for display in views and animations.
Returns a data object that contains the image in JPEG format.
Returns the image resized to the specified height while maintaining the aspect ratio.
Returns the image resized to the specified width while maintaining the aspect ratio.
The bitmap representation of the image
Creates a thumbnail image at the specified size asynchronously on a background thread.
Decodes an image asynchronously and provides a new one for display in views and animations.
The symbol name of the image.
Creates a new symbol image with the specified configuration.
Returns the image resized to fit the specified size.
The quality at which the main colors of an image should be analysed. A higher value takes longer to analyse.
Creates and returns an animated image from the specified images.
The number of frames of an animated (e.g. GIF) image.
A SwiftUI representation of the image.
Returns the image rounded with the specified corner radius.
Decodes an image asynchronously and provides a new one for display in views and animations.
The order of image tiles.
Returns the image as circle.
The animation duration of an animated (e.g. GIF) image.
Creates an image object with the specified color and size.
Analysis the main colors of the image asynchronously on a background thread.
Returns a data object that contains the specified image in PNG format.
Returns an object scaled to the curren screen that may be used as the contents of a layer.
Returns a new version of the current image with the specified tint color.
